效果: When performing a Helix Leap, deals Anemo Damage equal to 256.0% of ATK to nearby enemies.
After defeating an enemy in mid-air, reset the character's air jump count, up to a maximum of 6.0 times.
Upon landing from a height, deals Smash Damage equal to 128.0% of ATK to nearby enemies.
While taking damage in mid-air, the damage taken is reduced by 10.0%.
Survives Fatal damage, reducing the character's HP to 1. This effect can only be triggered once every 300.0s max.
When taking damage, there is a -50.0% chance to reduce the damage taken by 20.0%.
When using an Ultimate Skill, restores HP equal to 3.0% of max HP to teammates within a 10-metre range. This effect can only be triggered once every 5.0s.
Gains immunity to Hitstun, but Damage Dealt is reduced by 15.0% (unaffected by other Demon Wedges).
When performing a Dodge, deals Pyro Damage equal to 256.0% of ATK to enemies near the starting point.

Each Combo Level increases CRIT Chance by 20.0%.
Each Combo Level increases Trigger Probability by 16.0%.

When dealing CRIT Damage, there is a 100.0% chance to disarm the target.

Upgrades Sword Normal Attack to deal double the damage of the standard attack.
Upgrades Sword Charged Attack to deal double the damage of the standard attack.
Upgrades Sword Charged Attack to hurl a thunderblade that explodes after a short delay, damaging enemies in a large AoE. Deals double the damage of the standard attack.
Upgrades the Polearm Charged Attack to throw 5 polearms forward, attacking enemies in your path for double the damage of the standard attack.
Upgrades the Polearm Plunging Attack to trigger a bigger shockwave on impact, dealing double the damage of the standard attack.
Upgrades Polearm Normal Attack to summon phantom spears that strike the target. Deals double the damage of the standard attack.
Upgrades Polearm Charged Attack to launch a forward dash, damaging enemies in the user's path for double the damage of the standard attack.
Upgrades the Greatsword Normal Attack to unleash 3 Swordwaves upon final hit, cleaving through enemies in your path for double the damage of the standard attack.

Upgrades the Greatsword Charged Attack to allow movement during charging while capturing controllable monsters along the path (up to 4). Spending combos extends the charging window, culminating in a powerful AoE attack upon release or timeout that deals double the damage of the standard attack.
Upgrades Greatsword Normal Attack to summon rotating gears that unleash a flurry of strikes. Deals double the damage of the standard attack.
Upgrades the Dual Blades Sliding Attack into a lethal dash, slashing through all enemies in your path for double the damage of the standard attack.
Upgrades Dual Blades Normal Attack to combine the blades into a returning throw. Deals double the damage of the standard attack.
Upgrades Dual Blades Charged Attack to combine the blades and hurl them forward, damaging enemies in their path. Deals double the damage of the standard attack.
Upgrades the Katana Charged Attack. Upon striking an enemy, the character leaps into the air and slams down, dealing multiple hits to surrounding foes for double the damage of the standard attack.
